ns0:dependency.name: MapDB API Plugin
ns0:dependency.ns0:description: This plugin provides a shared dependency on the MapDB library so that other plugins can co-operate when using this library.

ns0:dependency.name: mapdb
ns0:dependency.ns0:description: MapDB provides concurrent Maps, Sets and Queues backed by disk storage or off-heap memory. It is a fast, scalable and easy to use embedded Java database.
